src:
Električni mrk, odgovorni pojasnili
Skoraj dve uri je bil del Slovenije brez elektrike. 
07 Nov 2019, 15:10 by Ma. M.
LJUBLJANA – Po sredinem večernem električnem mrku na območju od približno Rudnika do Kočevja, so odgovorni sporočili, zakaj je prišlo do izpada. Spomnimo, brez elektrike je bilo približno dve uri 50 tisoč uporabnikov.»Dne 6. 11. 2019 ob 19:29:21 je prišlo do izpada DV 110kV Kočevje-Hudo. Zaradi izpada DV je bilo posledično prekinjeno napajanje RTP-jev Grosuplje, Ribnica in Kočevje. DV 2x110 kV Beričevo-Grosuplje, ki prav tako napaja omenjene RTP-je je bil izklopljen zaradi del na tem DV, kar je povzročilo, da je bilo teh RTP enostransko, in sicer po DV 110 kV Kočevje-Hudo. Takoj po izpadu, ob 19:31e bil izveden poskusni ponovni vklop izpadlega DV, ki pa je bil neuspešen. Zaradi motenega odjema so bila dela na DV 2x110 kV Beričevo-Grosuplje prekinjena in DV 110 kV Beričevo-Grosuplje 2 je bil vklopljen ob 21:23:27 s čimer je bilo vzpostavljeno ponovno napajanje vseh treh RTP-jev. Vzrok za izpad DV je bil v pretrganem vodniku, 13 km iz RP Hudo v kraju Dvor. Vodnik se je pretrgal pri kompresijski spojki. Razlog za pretrganje se preučuje,« je pojasnila Katja Fašink iz Elesa.
text:
Electric eclipse, responsible explanation
For almost two hours, part of Slovenia was without electricity.
07 Nov 2019, 14:10 by Ma. M.
LJUBLJANA - After a mid-evening electrical eclipse in the area from about Mine to Kočevje, people said they were responsible for the blackout. Remember, without electricity, there were about 50,000 users without electricity for two hours. ”On November 6, 2019 at 7:29:21 PM, the 110kV Kočevje-Hudo power outage occurred. Due to the failure of the DV, the power supply to the RTSs Grosuplje, Ribnica and Kočevje was interrupted. The 2x110 kV Beričevo-Grosuplje power line, which also supplies the above mentioned RTPs, was switched off due to works on this DV, which resulted in these RTPs being one-sided, following the 110 kV Kočevje-Hudo DV. Immediately after the outage, at 19: 31e an attempt was made to reactivate the failed DV, which was unsuccessful. Due to the interrupted supply, the works on the 2x110 kV Beričevo-Grosuplje line were interrupted and the 110 kV Beričevo-Grosuplje 2 line was switched on at 21:23:27, thus restoring the power supply to all three RTPs. The reason for the DV failure was in a broken guide, 13 km from Hudo RP in Dvor. The guide broke at the compression coupling. The reason for the break is being investigated, ”explained Katja Fashink of Eles.
